summary: Edits the values of ingredient effects from 83Willow's 101 Bugs mod to be more in line with vanilla ingredients.
descriptionHtml: This mod is a patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4955/?]83Willow's 101 Bugs mod[/url]﻿, which alters ingredient effect values to a less ridiculous level. Many of the ingredients in this mod have effect values far beyond the standard (e.g. a ladybug thorax has Restore Health at something like magnitude 25 when the base game only has ingredients with Restore Health at magnitude 5). This patch reduces all the extreme ingredient values to a more believable level; up to either 1.5x or 2x the default magnitude or duration, or simply reduced to standard levels.
author: Zaerosz
